biotools.summary:
a novel approach to inferring gene-gene net-works using SPACE model with log penalty.

We develop SpaceLog that employs log penalty within the framework of an earlier method space (Sparse PArtial Correlation Estimation). We show that the SpaceLog has good performance, particularly for networks with hubs. The R package is available to download on github.

bioschemas.name: spacelog
bioschemas.summary:
a novel approach to inferring gene-gene net-works using SPACE model with log penalty.

We develop SpaceLog that employs log penalty within the framework of an earlier method space (Sparse PArtial Correlation Estimation). We show that the SpaceLog has good performance, particularly for networks with hubs. The R package is available to download on github.
